overview: Tiyo and his best friend Jeff roam the streets of Port-au-Prince doing odd jobs for change. Upon running through the narrow corridors of a poor slum village, they come across a meeting that forever changes their fate. Entangled by the grip of his Big Brother's gang, Tiyo is now faced with either pledging loyalty or losing the confidence of his grandfather. A decision that binds him to inevitable consequences.
title: Port of a Prince
